title: Setbacks
description:
Shauna McGarry, David Bell and Tracey Starin share stories about hot tubs for hemorrhoids, a Catholic divorce, and staying strong after going blind.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (David Bell, Echo & The Bunnymen, Phoebe Killdeer & The Short Straws, Shauna McGarry, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison, Tracey Starin)
